alert.note: Alert for Southeast Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 1:16PM MST until January 18 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Southeast Utah. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
